headline: We May Never See Bolton’s Book
abstract: The fate of his memoir is up to government censors. That’s troubling.
lead_paragraph: Thanks to a leak to the press, we all now know that John Bolton has written an explosive account of President Trump’s fateful decision to withhold hundreds of millions of dollars in security assistance from Ukraine. But it is far from clear how much of this story the public will be permitted to read, and when.
keywords: The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir (Book)
Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
